summary: This document is a letter from an individual to Scott Stickman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing the removal of Power of Attorney and all authorities related to specific accounts. The letter indicates a formal request regarding financial management.

persons.name: Scott Stickman
persons.context: Scott Stickman is addressed in the letter as the recipient at UBS Financial Services, indicating his role in managing the accounts mentioned.

keyFacts: The letter is addressed to Scott Stickman at UBS Financial Services.
The letter authorizes the removal of Power of Attorney for certain accounts.
